item.description:
Hi Ladies!

I met many of you at the dating discussions meetup. Some of the stories I heard made me shake my head in awe and dismay. Others, made me laugh hysterically! That all being said, I need to document your stories for the play/musical I am writing.

I have been wanting to write this play for many years and 2013 is the year I am going to do it! It is a play about dating from the woman's perspective and it is all going to be based on true happenings!

I want you to come prepared to share your most outrageous stories! They can be about anything! The more insane, the better! I'll be bringing a tape recorder and notebook with me to make sure I don't miss a thing!

So, if you have no plans for Valentine's weekend and you want to hang out with a bunch of ladies to share food, drink and laughs, please join us!

We'll meet in Worcester, Shrewbury or Westborough. I need to see how many ladies are interested before I choose the location. If anyone knows of a restaurant that has a small room we can use, please let me know.

Hope to see you on the 17th!
item.name: Ladies! Spend an afternoon eating, drinking and exchanging dating horrors!
